Description: Papyrus; Liturgy of Paaa; frame 1; Hieratic text in red and black recto and verso.
Curator's comments: See J. Assmann et al. Altaegyptische Totenliturgien II Totenliturgien und Totensprueche in Grabinschriften des Neuen Reiches (Heidelberg 2005), 152-3.
To be published by J. Assmann and M. Bommas. Publication rights previously given to T. G. H. James; others working on contexts include Yekaterina Barbash (AbD at Johns Hopkins University).
Bibliographic references: Quirke 1993 / Owners of funerary papyri in the British Museum (149)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (381039) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/381039)
